import React,{useContext, useState} from 'react' import noteContext from "../contexts/notes/noteContext"; export default function AddNotes() { const context = useContext(noteContext); const {addNote} = context; const [note,setNote]=useState({title:"",description:""}) const handleOnClick = (e)=>{ addNote(note) } const onClick =(e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return ( <>

Add a Note

Your Note

) }
